subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
Alzheimer's Disease
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Pat Summitt, the Tennessee women’s basketball coach, has early onset Alzheimer’s. On Sunday, she led the Lady Volunteers to victory and won an award for courage.
snippet: Pat Summitt, the Tennessee women’s basketball coach, has early onset Alzheimer’s. On Sunday, she led the Lady Volunteers to victory and won an award for courage.
